Text: The crack for this puts out a Trojan, DrXJ.exe just to let you know.
that's not actually a Trojan. ive used the DrXJ hack for a very long time and it works well. it's just how it's hacked, but it isn't a Trojan.

A trojan is a very very horrible virus! It enables the creator to hack/control the computer it is on. But the only way to get it onto your computer is to run it. That is why people stick it into an .exe file. So when you run the file, you also get a nasty little Trojan virus. Watch out for em.

Oooh, also I discovered something, aft er restarting my computer, and trying to run the pro version (crack), it gave me a .dll error. so I looked into it. After about 10 minutes, I discovered that you need to run it as Admin...

Sooo, for all of you Vista users, or those of you who (like me) decided to Beta Windows 7, Right click the shortcut and click properties, after that, under the shortcut tab, click advanced. You should see the option to run as Administrator, check it. This may only work for windows 7, as I don't have a pc with vista handy, but you should be able to find out how to run it as Admin..
